name: Core Defect: Meet Layla
description:
SYNOPSIS

This is a visual novel is a side project designed to introduce the player to the main character Layla from the game Core Defect; a college project created by the Level 3 Year 2 (2018) students at Colchester Institute.

In the future a space war is occuring, Earth is being overrun by war bots and it is up to a small task force to save the day. Meet Layla a member of this task force along with her little sidekick C.H.I.P a helpful pet robot. You are a citizen from Earth, rescued by Layla and currently recieving aid from her. Come talk to her and discover more about Layla, her sidekick and world devastated by war!

~

CREDITS

Programming & Art by JinxTheCupcake

Music by Cameron North

Editing by Dot Went

Story by JinxTheCupcake & Jordan Freeman

~
